Texts.Chs: 把^orange;麦芽^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;malt^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 很好。请注意，如果你需要黑麦芽，你只需要把麦芽放入^orange;熔炉^white;烤得更久一点。
Texts.Eng: Nice. Note that if you need dark malt, you just need to put back your malt into the ^orange;Furnace^white; and cook it some more.

Texts.Chs: 现在是时候进行下一步了。首先，把1份^orange;小麦^white;放到^green;雨水收集桶^white;里，一旦浸湿后，就把它们移到^green;育芽工作台^white;上。最后把发芽的小麦种子取出，再放进^orange;熔炉^white;里。
Texts.Eng: Time to use some new stations. First, put one ^orange;wheat^white; into the ^green;Rain Barrel^white;. Once it's soaked, put it into the ^green;Sprouting Table^white;. Then take your sprouted wheat and place it into a ^orange;Furnace^white;.
